entries.title: Fire Emblem Engage - 14 Things I Wish I Knew
entries.description: Fire Emblem Engage is a deep and rewarding tactical RPG. However, it has a steep learning curve and to get the most out of Engage you need to engage with all its systems. Here are 14 things you should know before starting.

entries.title: Firearms Expert Reacts To Deep Rock Galactic’s Guns
entries.description: Jonathan Ferguson, a weapons expert and Keeper of Firearms & Artillery at the Royal Armouries, breaks down more of the weaponry of Deep Rock Galactic, including the “Thunderhead” Heavy Autocannon, the Corrosive Sludge Pump, and the M1 Garand-inspired M1000 Classic.
